name: Star Hunter (Alexander Voit)
description:
Alexander Voit

(Solo Developer).

In the game Star Hunter, the player lands on the platform somewhere in space. The Player's objective is to collect stars and avoid obstacles by jumping over them. The game has 2 levels, start and finish the menu. Arrow keys are used to perform the movement to the left or right (alternatively, "A" and "D" keys can be used), space bar is used for the jump, "esc" key is used to pause/game menu. The game menu includes reset the score and restart the game, restart (without resetting the highest score), resume, and quit options. By the end of the level, you can see the highest score.
